Reviews.Title: Just What I Needed
Reviews.Author: Todd R
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a failed original unit. This replacement unit works perfectly.  The instructions for programming it were a little off, but once I got it programmed everything worked fine.  The price on Amazon was good and delivery was quick. Definitely satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Not like the one I ordered.
Reviews.Author: Mama3
Reviews.Content: I ordered this remote to replace the one that I currently have for my wheelchair accessible van. It is to open and close the wheelchair ramp. I did not realize that it would not come with instructions on how to program it for the wheelchair ramp. I still have not been able to program it and am still having to use the old one which only works occasionally. Very frustrating to say the least. My 10 year old son is in a wheelchair and I really need this to work.

Reviews.Title: this is not the product they send out. i got a way after market product that couldnt be programed
Reviews.Author: bishop
Reviews.Content: this is not the product they send out. i got a way after market product that couldnt be programed. dont do find a store in your local area

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Brian K. Spence
Reviews.Content: The remotes work perfectly. took a few trys to get the combination perfect but once I got it down I was able to program Both remotes with easily

Reviews.Title: I'm Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Nahog2
Reviews.Content: I own a 2001 Hyundai Sonata. Works fine! I admit that I did have a tough time installing the device at first. Had to look up where my "valet button" was on my car (under the dash below my steering wheel) and also have to run my vehicle (as opposed to just turning the key to the "on" position). Once I had those little details down, installation was a snap! Works exactly the way I expected.

Reviews.Title: Poorly advertised
Reviews.Author: Sheri Smith
Reviews.Content: We couldn't get it to work. It said it was compatible with my remote start system, but it is not.

Reviews.Title: Nice & Works Great
Reviews.Author: Todd Chiniquy
Reviews.Content: It was difficult for me to program (based on the instructions) so I stopped by a place that has installed several stereos in the past and had them program it for me. It took the guy a couple minutes but after it worked perfect.

Reviews.Title: Works instead of 473 remote.
Reviews.Author: Ru-slavic
Reviews.Content: Worked instead of 473 remote on Python XP1200. Just lock button acts as lock/unlock and lock button doesn't do anything.

Reviews.Title: Worked Great But wrong instructions.
Reviews.Author: Marvin Radona
Reviews.Content: I tried following the directions given, but it was not correct.  My alarm system does not have a remote start so it uses different channels. I found a much detailed instruction at http://www.directedstore.com/manuals/474P.pdf.  Works great!!!  If I did not get it working I would have to either bring it to a professional or buy a new alarm system.

Reviews.Title: FOB
Reviews.Author: Danny Lee
Reviews.Content: worked great was brand new came on time and program as indicated and came with an extra padding which was awesome ty

Reviews.Title: Surprise At The Results!!!!
Reviews.Author: andre duke
Reviews.Content: I have bought so many remote keypads,it's sad......but I said, before I take my truck back to dealer.....and pay 300 for a factory one I give this a try. I had a little issue with programming the timer, my truck would start up every hour,....until I realized that I didn't set the timer....and it was below weather here....but over all excellent product.....you will not regret buying this!

Reviews.Title: does not look like the picture
Reviews.Author: jason curry
Reviews.Content: it still the same thing but they should show what they are sending, other than that it works fine.  thanks.

Reviews.Title: review of Python 474PX
Reviews.Author: tammy
Reviews.Content: Python 474P TX met our  expectations.  It works exactly as we hoped it would.I would reccomend this product to anyone in need.

Reviews.Title: Not Exactly Like the Picture
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Radtke
Reviews.Content: The product shipped was not exactly like the picture, but works just like the original. I didn't want to fuss to make it work, so I returned to ABC Warehouse where I had the starter installed and they programmed it for a small fee. Money well spent. Works great!

Reviews.Title: appreciate...
Reviews.Author: MF
Reviews.Content: Received as expected... I appreciate the quick response as I was definitely in desperate need of having it at this time of year.

Reviews.Title: Fob
Reviews.Author: Valerie Morin
Reviews.Content: Need to replace my fob.Works well just had to have a pro program it to my car but he did it for free

Reviews.Title: Works fine, a little fragile
Reviews.Author: BR
Reviews.Content: Bough to replace the factory one that came with the remote start. Note that on the remote I got the button colors were different - no big deal, but worth noting. These remotes work great, easy to program, etc. Only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is that the bottom of the remote where the key ring passes through is kind of fragile - our old one still worked fine but cracked there and wouldn't stay on the key ring. That said, it stood up to 6 years of abuse before it cracked, so it's not terrible, just worth noting.

Reviews.Title: not sure whats wrong
Reviews.Author: M. A. Khan
Reviews.Content: The remote looks okay, model number matches the old one. I am following the instructions to program it. All signs of programmed are according to the instructions but I still can't get it to work. Will appreciate a tip from somebody.

ProductInfo.Name: Python 474P TX Remote with Extra Keypad for 474PX
